replies.body: jax, xin, yi, amumu, cho, evelyn,nasus, rammus, sion, udyr, fiddlesticks, tryndamere, and there are probably more
thanks, but can you narrow it down a bit more? lol
Jax is probably the best on that list, along with udyr.

Well in the 1350 range there's actually some decent ones so you're in luck c:

{{champion:33}}  Rammus is a really good pick if your team lacks a tank and engage  his taunts are also crazy good for ganking and are even better if the laner has cc
But if Tanks aren't your playstyle 
There's  {{champion:24}}  Jax who recently got stronger with the new trinity
{{champion:5}}  Xin Zhao  Same reason above 
And there's Also {{champion:28}}  Evelyn

{{champion:32}} 450 IP
{{champion:11}} 450 IP
{{champion:9}} 1350 IP
{{champion:77}} 1350 IP
{{champion:5}} 1350 IP

Master Yi and Xin are very snowbally champions. You don't need much time to learn them. Learning Xin's spell rotation takes longer than the other 4.
Amumu and Fiddlesticks are easy to understand and to execute. Amumu has 1 skill-shot with large hit-box and a game deciding ultimate.
Udyr is probably the easiest champion to learn (skillset wise) and he's not hard to master, but you need to understand the game and the jungler role very well.
